name: Deep Trouble (AutumnL1)
description:
Welcome to Deep Trouble! Deep Trouble is a bullet hell game created for the score space game jam theme one bullet. The concept was to apply the one bullet concept in a retro space shooting arcade game where you can only have one bullet in the chamber that refreshes when you kill an enemy or after a short Grace Period. The enemies are inspired by h.p. lovecrafts creations and were animated in 2D by jeremydidraws and 3d by cleverraven.

Controls

W/A/S/D to Move

Space to Shoot

Hold Space to Charge Shot

F5 to restart xD

CREDITS

cleverraven - 3D models + animations

jeremydiddraws - 2D pixel art + animations

platano - music + sfx

autumn - unity dev

Please use the downloadable windows version of the game for leader boards.
